name: mikapyon
description: miKaPyon is a rabbit girl in a colorful 3D platformer full of fast freerunning and jump challenges, wall-jumps and sliding over hills and loops.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10, 32 bit / 64 bit (x86) Processor: 2 GHz, SSE2, Intel Pentium 4 / Pentium M / AMD Athlon 64 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 / ATI Radeon 9500 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
